topic.name: Personal Finance Foundations
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Personal Finance Foundations in Mathematics

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify money as a limited resource.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify needs vs. wants.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify saving for a rainy day.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Name a big goal to save for.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify interest (money growing).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify food and shelter as needs.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify toys and candy as wants.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify marketing tricks.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify tax as money for the community.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Name roads and schools as things taxes pay for.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify Net Pay vs. Gross Pay.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify giving to God first.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Identify charities.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that when money is spent, it is gone.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that emergencies happen.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that we can be happy without everything we want.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that we follow rules.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Observe sales tax added to a price.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Recall that God loves a cheerful giver.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Observe generosity.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Sort coins into 'Spend', 'Save', and 'Give' jars.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Track savings for a small toy.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the purpose of a budget (plan for money).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain income (money coming in) vs. expenses (money going out).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the envelope system.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the discipline of budgeting as stewardship.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Keep money in a safe place.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize why we need emergency money.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain short-term vs. long-term savings.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain sinking funds.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the wisdom of the ant (Proverbs 6).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Choose one item from two options.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the difference between essential and non-essential.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain opportunity cost (if I buy this, I can't buy that).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Prioritize a shopping list.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain delayed gratification.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the virtue of frugality against consumerism.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize Sales Tax (extra money at the register).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain Income Tax (money taken from pay).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain tax returns.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the Christian duty to pay taxes (Romans 13).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Put a coin in the offering plate.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize the concept of the Tithe (10%).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how giving helps others.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Explain the widow's mite (proportion vs. amount).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the New Testament principle of grace giving.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze a monthly household budget (mock scenario).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret a pie chart of spending categories.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Connect tracking expenses to reaching financial goals.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Calculate how long it takes to save a specific amount.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the recommendation of 3-6 months expenses.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the liquidity of savings accounts.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Connect savings to peace of mind.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the influence of peer pressure on spending.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret the cost per use of an item.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Connect contentment to financial health.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Calculate the total cost with tax.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze tax brackets (progressive system).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret a pay stub (FICA, Medicare).

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Connect property tax to funding local services.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Calculate the tithe on $5.00, $10.00, etc.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Analyze the difference between tithes and offerings.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Interpret percentages for giving goals.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Connect generosity to trust in God's provision.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the impact of irregular income.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the trade-off between saving and paying debt.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate lifestyle inflation.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the difference between tax credits and deductions.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the efficiency of charitable organizations.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Create a simple budget for a weekly allowance.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Construct a zero-based budget for independent living.

objectives.objective_text: Synthesize spreadsheet skills with financial planning.

objectives.objective_text: Construct a savings plan for a major life event.

objectives.objective_text: Synthesize compound interest formulas with savings goals.

objectives.objective_text: Construct a definition of 'enough'.

objectives.objective_text: Synthesize critical thinking with purchase decisions.

objectives.objective_text: Construct a mock tax filing (1040 EZ concept).

objectives.objective_text: Synthesize percentages with civic responsibility.

objectives.objective_text: Construct a giving plan based on gross vs. net income.

objectives.sub_subject_name: Financial Math & Stewardship (Biblical & Practical Applied Math)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize financial math with kingdom priorities.
